Summary: On this morning at 0556 i was sitting in my truck and caught a very bright white orb heading South flying low over the ocean. Orb/UFO was close and would wobble and then hover. It winked out one time then reappeared to continue its southern course. .
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailson this morning at 0556 i was sitting in my truck looking west and caught a very white bright orb\ufo in the north at daybreak at 1:00. it was heading south slowly just wobbling and flying above the ocean inland (very low) taking its time. as i got out of my truck and started to video and speak the orb winked out. this orb\ufo was very silent, and all you could hear was the small waves hitting the shoreline. at this point i got back in my truck in hopes it would return. it reappeared at 0600 at about 12:00 low once again to the ocean. due south appeared to be its course, and there was a tinge of yellow with white now. once again, i got out of my truck and proceeded to get videos and pictures with my nikon digital camera. this time the orb\ufo stuck around for few minutes and would just hover in one spot as i watched it and snapped more pictures. this object remained silent. within a few minutes out of nowhere, and i am in the middle of no where a large sounding vehicle was coming down the road from the south east. i am 28 miles from town out in the national forest and a large vehicle, which when it turned to come down the hill and intrude upon my ufo sighting moment was actually a tow truck! yeah, if you can believe that. i was thinking to myself, what in the frick is that doing out here at this time of the morning and out of all the pull offs, this one. there were two men, they both got out not only looking at me, but then looked at the beach and rocks below. i continued my sighting adventure. my ufo started to flash red, white, orange and yellow and start to accelerate and ascend to the south silently. this i had seen many times before with similar objects. as i looked through my binoculars once again i could not identify it and it resembled the others i had seen in prior sightings. it was flat with alot of bright white lights, and red flashing on the bottom, with some orange..tints of yellow. it like the others, headed towards the small mountain ridge to the south east and then disappeared. just like that it was gone. upon my departure, the two men with the tow truck started to pull some "dummie's" truck up off the beach and rocks below the parking area. as i headed home exhaustion and fatigue would over come me, so i ended up sleeping most of the morning until 1146 . which, sleeping in is not a very common occurance for me.
